documents.document: @katejhewson Meridian is good I think? That's what we have in a massive pot.
50 000 words! Ah these milestones make it feel reeeeeal! #amwriting #firstnovel #firstdraft
Ok, its been unreal but I must mute this now. Ive had a great time learning about cereal from people all over the world. Youre fun sometimes Twitter x https://t.co/LuGvER0DcR

Im so sorry to anyone who has been voting for me and then disappointed. They should really tell you that youre a US politician if you have never been to the US
*smashes head into a wall for eternity* https://t.co/Y8LbZIpd0o
@dave_boon Her husband is not aware hes her husband
Why did none of you tell me Im a US politician? https://t.co/km7MLEmvTG
Sorry your police team didnt win tonight. Stupid VAR (probably?) but hey look theyll get them next time would you like a biscuit? #DontWatchItButTryingToHelp
@Special_Hijabi Yes
Heres what Ive learned this weekend: people really REALLY feel stuff about cereal https://t.co/LuGvER0DcR

Im seeing my niece for the first time in a year today. Shes 1 and her Dad is a gardener so I made him for her https://t.co/M7Cqk4isa2

Free palettes recycled and lined with saved compost bags. Just waiting for my compost order for the main planter and my tomatoes and sweet corn can go in
My mental health has been fried this week so I took the day off and made myself a herb garden https://t.co/QsyAHnOWrw
@benjaminpmoore It's very cosy. I can already see myself rewatching it because I like the characters and just want to hang out with them

@marchblossomb yes, sadly I think it would have been pretty much just you and me in the Zoom call. Bit of a bummer but online ticket sales just didn't happen now that things are opening a bit again :( xx
Starstruck (BBC iplayer) is like the BEST biscuits. I sat down for one and 90 minutes later I'm sat here panicking about when they're all gone. Beautiful comedy. WONDERFUL looking show. I'm in love.

@Faybe1989 @yespaulineeyre @brionyred @JulietteBurton @hannahwarman @johnbond75babe @diaryofamaddie @IamRichWilson @sianharries_ @MCabournSmith @ZoePaskett @harrietkemsley @samanthabaines @SharonRobertsUK @VixHamBarritt @JennyBede @YurikoComedy @Isysuttie @NadiaSohawon @JenBrister @Wendy_Wason @bronactitley @kiripritchardmc @sueperkins @suziruffell @PRVix @CamilleUcan @KerryAGodliman @lucyportercomic @Hayles_Ellis @CharlieVMartin @savencomedy @rachelparris @NiamhAWalsh @Roisinconaty @FunnySuzyB @LouSanders @maddy_anholt @tiffstevenson @ShappiKhorsandi @tweetyedmondson @rosejohnno @SuzanneShaw @KlassMyleene @RachelFairburn @AngelaBarnes @lolwordcomedy @MaisieAdam hahaha give in to that feeling babe! non-essentials get jettisoned when you're in pulling back together mode. We're still just all here, chatting nonsense and showing off. We'll still be doing that when you are interested again x
RT @TreasuresPod: Get those out of offices on: It's holiday time for us and those pesky banks! Pull up a comfy chair and get stuck in to ou
@meadowgroove It's the support for self employed people who have lost their income. Like, instead of furlough pay I think.

I hate that I felt guilty applying for the SEISS grant. Really racking my brains like "do I need this". Er, yes, you eejit: you lost 80% of your income. Yeah, but I *could* cope without it so... should I? That I feel like this and then Cayman bank accounts exist
@PopeLonergan Its not no reason: youre writing a book
I want to take my brain out and soak it in milk
When my therapist told me I need to face my fears, I'm not sure she meant write a sitcom about the worst thing I've ever been through. Jaysus and I thought the stand up special about it was hard
@KateWilliamsme ooh smashing. bought. thank you!
@marknelsoncomic Mine works, and also I can plug into it so it extends upstairs for my phone as wifi but can be plug in internet when I'm streaming.

Its finally raiiiiinnnniiiiiiing!

Oh no, the wifi is down. I shall have to take the day off work. But Laura, youre writing a novel, so... you just need to be able to write? SHUT UP FOOL. How will I procrastinate betwixt each and every paragraph? Just dont? ItS pArt oF My Pr0ceSS!!!!
Depressing that after all the missteps this year keeping people, you know, alive, the thing theyre getting him for his wallpaper. Its Al Capone all over again
We only broke a door handle and it was 1200 so smashing up the whole law for 20000 seems decent
Actually, sounds cheaper than Fox Sons tbh https://t.co/TSggaWVYG7
When we rented a flat we werent even allowed to repaint it the colour it already was. If Johnson gets his deposit back Im going to be raging

I really like Twitter and the kindness of strangers thank you Im cheering myself up by bothering a dog who really doesnt want to be bothered! https://t.co/ucLbBmUxhu
@FixatedOn Ooh thank you! That sounds great!
@meowmixtapes Yes please!
@EddieStoneComic Ive got my fingers crossed for adoption if all works out but we will see what the world holds! Big love to you xx
@YellingAtSoccer I started that last night weirdly! I loved the first two episodes
@EddieKristan Oh! Thats a great idea! Thank you xx
@Vermicious_Lid I reckon its along similar lines!
@IamKateWynne Hahaha! I have another 5 years before I can watch that due to the my brain doesnt let me watch things people have said are good until they are long gone rule
@Kempshills2 Love to you too xxx
@EddieStoneComic Ugh! It is! Its such a gut punch on the wrong day, isnt it? You spend so much time being ok about it and then your light entertainment catches you off guard. Sending a lot of love xx
Anyway. RIP Blackish I was really enjoying you.
I hate that it upsets me. I hate loving a sitcom and then resenting it even though its just a lovely carefree sitcom. I hate that this nice thing is the thing that kills me
Oh god can there just be ONE tv show that doesnt have a pregnancy storyline?! Just ONE SHOW I can watch without having to watch the but we werent even trying! Episode. Oh just ONE SHOW. One.

Its so easy to sit and spiral but remembering theres better is a majorly clever strength you have going on xxx

Re whether he said it: The fact a lot of us can really, honestly believe it's the kind of thing a leader of the country would say is either: A damning indictment on our leadership A damning indictment on where the media portrayal of our leadership has led our trust Or both

I know you all dont want to hear this, but, as someone on the outside, you all seem VERY stressed about Line of Duty. Like, more so than this pandemic thingy. Are you sure youre enjoying it?
